dn1:1.11.2: pañcamaṃ → pañcamaṃ iti vā (bj, sya-all, mr)
dn1:1.13.2: meṇḍayuddhaṃ → meṇḍakayuddhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | sobhanakaṃ → sobhanagarakaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | mahiṃsayuddhaṃ → mahisayuddhaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kumbhathūṇaṃ → kumbhathūnaṃ (bj, sya-all, mr) | dhovanaṃ → dhopanaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn1:1.15.2: hatthattharaṃ assattharaṃ rathattharaṃ → hatthattharaṇaṃ assattharaṇaṃ rathattharaṇaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
dn1:1.16.2: daṇḍaṃ → daṇḍakaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nāḷikaṃ → nālikaṃ (sya-all) | asiṃ → asiṃ khaggaṃ (sya-all, km); khaggaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn1:1.17.2: itthikathaṃ → itthīkathaṃ (bj); itthikathaṃ purisakathaṃ (cck, km, mr); itthīkathaṃ purisakathaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
dn1:1.20.1: lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsitāro ca → lābhena ca lābhaṃ nijigiṃsitāro (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn1:1.24.2: sūriyaggāho → suriyaggāho (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | devadudrabhi → devadundubhi (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn1:2.27.19: hoti ca na ca hoti → hoti ca na hoti ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
